last_episode_to_air.name: Gotta Super-Supercharge It!! Grand Prix Final  Free Skate
last_episode_to_air.overview: "Let's end this." Yuri's words trigger a debate that results in Yuri appearing at the free skate event in his worst condition ever. Can Yuri succeed in skating a program with the highest technical difficulty at their last event together to show the world the love he shares with Victor? What will each conclude once the program is over and it is time to decide their paths after the Grand Prix Final?

name: Yuri!!! on Ice
overview: Yuuri Katsuki carried all of Japan's hopes on his shoulders to win at the Gran Prix Finale ice skating competition, but suffered a crushing defeat. He returns home to Kyushu and half feels like he wants to retire, and half feels like he wants to continue ice skating. Suddenly the five-time consecutive world championship ice skater Victor Nikiforov appears before him with Yuri Plisetsky, a young Russian figure skater who is already defeating his seniors. Victor and both Yuris take up the challenge on an unprecedented Gran Prix series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Figure skater Yuri Katsuki flops in his latest season. When five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov becomes his coach, he gets another chance.

episodes.name: Easy as Pirozhki!! The Grand Prix Final of Tears
episodes.overview: Katsuki Yuuri is at a crossroads after suffering a miserable defeat at the Grand Prix Finals. Uncertain whether to retire or to continue, Yuuri holes up in his family home. However, a chance circumstance causes him to catch the eye of five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov...

episodes.name: Two Yuris?! Drama at Yu-topia
episodes.overview: Out of nowhere, five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov declares himself Yuuri's coach. When world junior champion Yuri Plisetsky follows Victor to Hasetsu so that he can bring Victor back to Russia, the chaos only deepens...

episodes.name: I Am Eros, and Eros is Me?! Face-Off! Hot Springs on Ice
episodes.overview: The two Yuris are to face off in Hot Springs on Ice. where they will each debut a short program choreographed by Victor—one to Eros, and one to Agape. Victor claims he will do whatever the winner wants, but...

episodes.name: Love Yourself...Achieved!! The Free Program
episodes.overview: The two Yuris begin to choreograph their free skate programs at their respective rinks. In Japan, Yuuri feels hesitant to pursue what it means to be uniquely him, but he begins to untangle his past by talking to Victor.

episodes.name: Face Beet-Red!! It's the First Competition! The Chugoku, Shikoku, and Kyushu Championship
episodes.overview: It is time for Yuuri's first competition of the season, but Victor's the center of attention as his first competition as a coach. Already anxious, Yuri's nerves don't get a break when Minami Kenjirou, the skater who beat Yuri at last year's nationals, confronts him...

episodes.name: China's On! The Grand Prix Series Opening Event!! The Cup of China Short Program
episodes.overview: The Cup of China, a Grand Prix Series event, is here! Realizing that he is the man who took Victor from the world, Yuuri gets worked up before his performance. Victor is concerned to see Yuuri this way for the first time...

episodes.name: China's On! The Grand Prix Series Opening Event!! The Cup of China Free Skate
episodes.overview: Having finished the short program in first place—a first-time feat—Yuuri falters under the massive pressure. Can his fragile heart withstand Victor's roughshod intervention?

episodes.name: Yuri vs Yuri! The Horror!! Rostelecom Cup, Short Program
episodes.overview: Yuuri is determined to show his love to all of Russia in the Rostelecom Cup, the final event of the Grand Prix Series. In contrast, Yurio feels bogged down by his ties to Moscow, and tries to shrug them off. Before them, however, rises JJ, a rising star from North America...

episodes.name: Yuri vs Yuri! The Horror!! Rostelecom Cup, Free Skate
episodes.overview: Katsuki Yuuri has already obtained "love." With Victor's fading warmth in his heart, Yuri goes out to the rink for his free skate that will determine whether he'll qualify for the Grand Prix Final. Yurio firms his own resolve after eating special pirozhki, the epitome of love in Moscow.

episodes.name: Gotta Supercharge it! Pre-Grand Prix Final Special!
episodes.overview: Barcelona is where the fated final battle will take place. Sightseeing during their free time, Victor is oblivious to Yuuri's resolve. Then, a chance remark reveals a nightmarish event at the banquet last year for Yuuri...

episodes.name: Gotta Super-Supercharge It!! Grand Prix Final Short Program
episodes.overview: Now armed with the light of love on his finger along with Victor, Yuuri goes for the gold in the Grand Prix Final as the chosen six competitors clash in the short program.

episodes.name: Gotta Super-Supercharge It!! Grand Prix Final  Free Skate
episodes.overview: "Let's end this." Yuri's words trigger a debate that results in Yuri appearing at the free skate event in his worst condition ever. Can Yuri succeed in skating a program with the highest technical difficulty at their last event together to show the world the love he shares with Victor? What will each conclude once the program is over and it is time to decide their paths after the Grand Prix Final?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Figure skater Yuri Katsuki flops in his latest season. When five-time world champion Victor Nikiforov becomes his coach, he gets another chance.
